domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text:
Today is World AIDS Day! 🐻🌈

Our #diversifly team supports the local @aidshilfewien with our colleagues' contribution for their AIDS teddy bear. With this fundraising campaign we want to boost AIDS prevention and treatment in Austria!

#diversitymatters #diversiflywithus https://t.co/UtFvbKDkXl

@Raphyy132 Hi Raphy, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can check your refund conditions. In case you should have purchased your ticket through a travel agency, please contact the agency directly regarding our options. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@R_0_M_Z [2/2]Please send us your booking code and your new dates of travel in a DM. We´ll gladly check the availability for you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@R_0_M_Z [1/2] Hi Abdallah, thank you for reaching out. I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@IRudolfsson Hi Isa, we are sorry to learn that your stroller was damaged. Please find more information about damaged baggage via the following link https://t.co/kMWmriifWh Kind regards, James

@BPrainsack Hallo Barbara,es tut uns leid, dass du so lange auf eine Antwort warten musstest: nein, du musst deinen Flug nicht auch noch stornieren. Das wird im Zuge der Rückerstattung erledigt. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @pearlmu02672638 Hi there, depending on your request you can find all our online webforms via the following link: https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9 Kind regards, Chris
@_Jeremy_Knox Hi Jeremy, if your flights are operating according to schedule a possible refund will depend on your booked fare conditions. Kind regards, Chris
@farmerevees Hi there, please send us your mail address in a DM so we can check if your request has been received by our system. Kind regards, Chris
@pearlmu02672638 Hi there, please be informed that the booked Economy Light fare does unfortunately not allow a rerouting. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@danielssnow Hi Daniel, you can rebook your flight for new travel dates providing you travel within 12 months of the purchase date of your ticket. There may be a change fee depending on your fare. The rebooking must be made before the originally planned date of travel. Kind regards, Chris

@Julia__Vol Hi, All customers are asked to take account of the entry and transit regulations at their respective destinations. As this is the specialized field of the immigration authorities we kindly ask you to contact these authorities or the embassy directly. Kind regards, Chris

@MartaRodriguezV Hi, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. We want to apologize for the delayed answer. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@andrewcwiles Hi Andrew, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@_doxus Hi Piotr, wir möchten uns bei dir für die Umstände entschuldigen. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@pearlmu02672638 Hi, as already mentioned we are not able to change your ticket to Dec 2022 regarding your ticket validity. You can only change your ticket within providing you travel within 12 months of the purchase date of your original ticket. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @_Jeremy_Knox Hi, a refund request is possible via this form https://t.co/S4MkU66ZMM. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @farmerevees Hi, we regret to read that you are not able to reach us. Please use the following online form regarding your refund request https://t.co/S4MkU66ZMM. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @danielssnow Hi Daniel, we can only refund according to the booked fare conditions from the ticket, please send us your request via this form https://t.co/S4MkU66ZMM. Kind regards, Christine
@IbbStanzio Hi, please mind longer handling times due to the current situation. Rest assured that you will receive an answer via e-mail as soon as possible. Kind regards, Christine
@allan_clarke Hi Allan, please DM us your booking code and we'll have a closer look at your request. Kind regards, James

@stevecarr6969 Dear Steve, all our channels are very busy so getting back to you takes time. We are working on every inquiry one by one and will get back to you asap. Please send us your booking reference and/or your ticket number in a DM so we can assist further. Best regards, Christiane

@Spyia Hi there, all our channels are very busy so getting back to you takes time. We are working on every inquiry one by one and will get back to you asap. Please send us your booking reference and/or your ticket number in a DM. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @Louis75003 Hi, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

@pearlmu02672638 Hi, you can rebook your flight for new travel dates providing you travel within 12 months of the purchase date of your original ticket. As your ticket has been issued on Sep 5th, rebooking to December 2022 is unfortunately not possible. Kind regards, Chris

@Ja_Le_C Hi there, we want to apologize one more time for any inconvenience caused. We just retrieved your booking and noticed that everything has been sorted out in the meantime. We just sent you a confirmation via mail one more time. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@PHiggenbottom Hi, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. We want to apologize for the delayed answer. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@PHiggenbottom Hi, According to information from the Ministery of Health, international travel is still possible despite the exit restrictions in Austria. However, selective adaptations in the flight operations of Austrian Airlines may apply. Kind regards, Chris

@rafapopien Hi there, unfortunately, all our service channels are very busy at the moment. This leads to long waiting and processing times. We are sorry for that. Please send us your booking code and your request in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@allan_clarke Hi, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. We want to apologize for the delayed answer. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@RoigViki Hi there, please send us your booking code and the new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@jimenamorlans Hi, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @Elise_Gabrielle Hi, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris
@theotherdaniwhu Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@Ruth_Caddick Hi Ruth, thank you for reaching out. What is your complaint about, so I can send you the respective link? Kind regards, Derya
@pearlmu02672638 Hi there, please send us your booking code and new preferred travel dates in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane
@galchs Hi Gal, you can also send us your booking code and new preferred travel dates in a DM so we can check your rebooking options here. Best regards, Christiane
@wingfieldj Hi John, I just replied to your other message. Best regards, Susi

@kathrynmichael Hi, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. We want to apologize for the delayed answer. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@Gemigna1Mariano Hi Mariano, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. We want to apologize for the delayed answer. How can we assist you? Kind regards, Chris

@MaxModden Hi Max, aufgrund der momentanen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und es kommt zu längeren Wartezeiten. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und die neuen gewünschten Flgdaten in einer DM. Gerne sehen wir uns das einmal an. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@duberyfirkin Hi, Unfortunately, we were not able to retrieve the booking code you have provided. Please send us the ticket number or the exact flight data in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@lucycolleer  Hi, did you try to use a different browser or switch to the desktop version if you're using a mobile device? Best regards, Susi

@steph_robertss  Hi, if the flights are scheduled as planned you're eligible for a refund according your booked fare conditions only. Have you considered about a rebooking: https://t.co/NQuCyj3MFh? Best regards, Susi

👉Please keep in mind to check your flight status before departure to the airport: https://t.co/Cp0qAYMvKB

#WeCare #Servus #AustrianAirlines

(3/3)

data.text:
👉Vienna International Airport remains open while the Covid-19 measures are in effect. 

👉Therefore, arriving, departing as well as transfer passengers can carry out their journey as planned. 

(2/3)

urls.title: Die aktuellen Maßnahmen zum Coronavirus im Überblick
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen zu den aktuellen Corona-Maßnahmen? Hier finden Sie Informationen zu den Maßnahmen auf bundesweiter sowie auf regionaler Ebene.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
+++ Current information regarding the Covid-19 measures in Austria (22 Nov - 12 Dec 2021) +++

According to information from the Austrian Ministry of Health, international travel is still possible. 
More information on the website of the @bmsgpk: https://t.co/ljI95um4tS 

(1/3) https://t.co/Fgb9AxBFXS

@memsstr Hi there, according to information from the Ministery of Health, international travel is still possible despite the exit restrictions in Austria. However you can rebook your trip. If there's anything we can assist with, send us a DM with your booking details. Kind regards, Ivana
@dt_dwh Dear David, unfortunately we will not offer Vouchers and refund is only possible according to the booked fare conditions. Kind regards, Ivana

@AcutePerception Hi there, we're very sorry but as you can probably imagine all our channels are very busy. If there's anything we can assist you with, send us a DM with your booking details and we'll get back asap. Kind regards, Ivana
@miryabesirovix @travelgenio Hi Mirza, is there anything we can do for you? Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@wineandsavagery Dear Natalie, sorry but all our channels are very busy. If there's anything we can assist you with, send us a DM with your booking code and we'll get back asap. Kind regards, Ivana

@2bid8offered Dear Ryan, according to information from the Ministery of Health, international travel is still possible despite the exit restrictions in Austria. If there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM with your booking details. Kind regards, Ivana

@PedroD32660554 Hi Pedro, we are sorry to hear, that you had difficulties getting in touch with us via phone. Please send us your booking code and your request in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into the matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@TedPatrik Dear Patrik, as you can probably imagine all our channels are very busy. You can send us a DM with your booking reference and we'll have a look asap. Kind regards, Ivana
@treble_tony [2/2] your tariff regulations. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@treble_tony [1/2] Hi Tony, thank you for reaching out. According to information from the Ministry of Health, international travel is still possible despite the exit restrictions in Austria. As long as your flights are taking place as planned your refund request will be handled according to
@wingfieldj Dear John, here's the refund web form: https://t.co/irFvoWIa6q. Kind regards, Ivana
@schnetzergeorg Lieber Georg, schick' uns doch bitte eine DM mit deinem Buchungscode. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@The_BoleynBoys Hi there, refunds are offered according to the booked fare conditions. Kind regards, Ivana
